title: snowflake.snowpark.DataFrameReader.orc | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Specify the path of the ORC file(s) to load.
path – The stage location of a ORC file, or a stage location that has ORC files.

When using DataFrame.select(), quote the column names to select the desired columns.
This is needed because converting from ORC to class:DataFrame does not capitalize the
column names from the original columns and a DataFrame.select() without quote looks for
capitalized column names.
a DataFrame that is set up to load data from the specified ORC file(s) in a Snowflake stage.
